p: All authors participated in the design and interpretation of the studies, the analysis of the data, and the review of the manuscript. AZA and RAAM arranged the plant material, authenticated, and made phytochemical analysis and extraction. AZA, FA, and MM have made substantial contributions in animal treatment, biochemical analysis, and interpretation of the data and drafted the manuscript. MMA, HMA, and SSA have made substantial contributions to the conception and design of the study, interpretation of the data, and final revision of the manuscript. MM, MMA, and AZA also contributed in histopathological preparations and slide screening.
